testcase.name: Check the gift card functionality for MakeMyTrip
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the homepage of MakeMyTrip application.....................passed When the user clicks on Giftcards...........................................passed And User selects category...................................................passed And User selects card.......................................................passed And User selects amount.....................................................passed And User enters name for gift card..........................................passed And User enters mobile number for gift card.................................passed And User enters email for gift card.........................................passed And User clicks on button for gift card.....................................passed Then Next page should be displayed..........................................passed
